author: Cleo Abram
description:
If the police find the stolen pieces from the Louvre, how will they know they’re real and not fake?

Imagine you’re the thief and you’re trying to replicate the stolen tiara. What’s gonna get you caught is the pearls! Here’s why… 

That’s why I’m willing to bet we’ll find them… eventually. 

If you think so too… subscribe!

#science #louvre #jewels #diamond #pearl #shorts
title: How to Fake the Stolen Louvre Jewels
